Data Science - Machine Learning¶

데이터 사이언스 - 머신러닝 관련 주요 예제들을 공유하는 공간입니다.

Data Preparation (EDA(탐색적 자료 분석, Exploratory Data Analysis))¶

  • Data Description(데이터 서술)
  • Missing Value(결측치)
  • Descriptive Statistics(기술적 통계)
  • Outlier(이상치)
  • Feature Selection(특징선택)
  • Feature Extraction(특징추출)
  • Feature Transformation(특징변환)
  • Imbalanced Class(불균형 클래스)

Model¶

  • Record Data

    • Supervised Learning(지도학습)
      • Regression(회귀)
        • Linear Regression
        • Polynomial Regression
        • SVM Regression
        • Ensemble Regression
        • DNN Regression
      • Classification(분류)
        • Logistic Regression
        • SGD Classification
        • SVM Classification
        • Ensemble Classification
        • DNN Classification
    • Unsupervised Learning(비지도학습)
      • Clustering(군집)
        • K-Means
        • Mean Shift
        • Spectral Clustering
        • Anomaly Detection

    • Recommendation(추천)

      • Collaborative Filtering(협업필터링)

    • Graph-based Data

    • Ordered Data

Learning¶

  • Split Train/Valid/Test
  • Model Persistence
  • Tansfer Learning

Evaluation¶

  • Regression
    • RMSE(Root Mean Squared Error)
    • R-Square
  • Classification
    • Confusion Matrix (Precision, Recall, F-Score)
  • Clustering
    • Adjusted Rand index
    • Mutual Information based scores
    • Homogeneity, completeness and V-measure
    • Fowlkes-Mallows scores
    • Silhouette Coefficient
    • Calinski-Harabasz Index
    • Davies-Bouldin Index
    • Contingency Matrix

주요 라이브러리¶

  • DeepLearning
    • Keras
      • Keras 10분만에 흝어보기
